text: Recipients of assistance from the District who move to another jurisdiction with intent to remain in that State shall be ineligible to receive assistance from the District immediately upon the date of the recipient's last day of residency in the District of Columbia.
historical:

DC CODE § 4-205.04

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Relocation of recipients to another jurisdiction.
